item.title: The Forgotten Elwell Hotel & Casino: A Vintage Las Vegas Story
item.description:
A Family’s Legacy in the Desert Bloom

Before the mega-resorts, before the themed hotels, and even before the Strip truly solidified its dominance, Las Vegas was built on the dreams and hard work of families like the Elwells. The story of the Elwell Hotel and Casino is a quintessential example of early Las Vegas â€“ a place where ambition, ingenuity, and a little bit of luck could build something from the desert floor.
